Description:
Detects the creation of a suspicious ADS (Alternate Data Stream) file by software other than browsers

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Creation Of a Suspicious ADS File Outside a Browser Download
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((contents like '[zonetransfer]  zoneid=3%' and filepath like '%:zone.identifier' and (filepath like '%.exe%' or filepath like '%.scr%' or filepath like '%.bat%' or filepath like '%.cmd%' or filepath like '%.docx%' or filepath like '%.hta%' or filepath like '%.jse%' or filepath like '%.lnk%' or filepath like '%.pptx%' or filepath like '%.ps%' or filepath like '%.reg%' or filepath like '%.sct%' or filepath like '%.vb%' or filepath like '%.wsc%' or filepath like '%.wsf%' or filepath like '%.xlsx%')) and  not ((process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgewebview\application\%' and process_path like '%\windowsapps\microsoftedge.exe' and (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe')) or ((process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgecore\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files\microsoft\edgecore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe' or (process_path like 'c:\program files\windowsapps\microsoft.screensketch_%' and process_path like '%\snippingtool\snippingtool.exe' and filepath like 'c:\users\%' and (filepath like '%\appdata\local\packages\microsoft.screensketch_%' and filepath like '%\tempstate\screenshot %') and filepath like '%.png:zone.identifier') or (process_path = 'c:\program files\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe') or process_path like '%\maxthon.exe' or process_path like '%\opera.exe' or process_path like '%\brave.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\program files\mozilla firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\mozilla firefox\firefox.exe') or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\internet explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\internet explorer\iexplore.exe') or process_path like '%\whale.exe'))
